content: 712437132240617572: Shou Mai i coded you, and i wanna test if i made it work. it's supposed to give you memory

{"GPT":"I'm sorry but as an AI language model, I don't have actual memory. Can you please provide more details about what you're trying to achieve?","Shou":"Memory? What, are you trying to make me remember all the times you pissed me off? Well, good luck with that, I have more important things to do."}
712437132240617572: Shou Mai what did i last say?

{"GPT":"I'm sorry but as an AI language model, I don't have any access to your previous conversation. Can you please provide more context on what you're referring to?","Shou":"Ugh, pay attention to your own words, Ghegi. How am I supposed to know what you last said? Do you expect me to have photographic memory like some sort of AI encyclopedia?"}
